text.0: On Tuesday, August 4, 2020, Lai Mohammed announced that the Federal Government had increased the fine for hate speech from N500,000 to N5m. However, in a court document, he denied ever making the announcement. Read the facts here: https://t.co/RI1DiQkhV9 #DubawaChecks

text.2: A phishing website claims that  the Federal Government is recruiting 50,000 youths. This is false. Phishing involves the extraction of users’ data and financial details for nefarious purposes.  Here are ways to protect yourself from phishing: https://t.co/04QUd3jDw7 #DubawaChecks
text.3: Twitter introduced a feature that labels government and state-affiliated media accounts. This is in a bid to fight misinformation and curb propaganda. How will this new feature play out in Nigeria? Read here: https://t.co/R5R8Qpi70S DubawaChecks
